tool_description:
Stocks API helps to query for the Financials Statement/Sheet that has over 10 years of finacial data.
DISCLAIMER: The data does not come from the macrotrends website.
name: MacroTrends Finance
title: MacroTrends Finance

api_list.name: History Dividend
api_list.description:
This gives you the Date, Open, High, Low, Close, Adj Close, Volume prices of the stock

QUERY PARAMETER: range = ['1y', '5y', '10y']
QUERY PARAMETER: interval = ['1d', 1wk', '1mo']

api_list.name: Financial Balance Sheet
api_list.description:
Gives 10 years data of cash statement by the given ticker symbol.

(symbol) To choose what ticker symbol to see the company financials.

api_list.name: History Prices
api_list.description:
This gives you the Date, Open, High, Low, Close, Adj Close, Volume prices of the stock

QUERY PARAMETER: range = ['1y', '5y', '10y']
QUERY PARAMETER: interval = ['1d', 1wk', '1mo']

api_list.name: Financial Income Statement
api_list.description:
Gives 10 years data of cash statement by the given ticker symbol.

(symbol) To choose what ticker symbol to see the company financials.

api_list.name: Financial Cash Statement
api_list.description:
Gives 10 years data of cash statement by the given ticker symbol.

(symbol) To choose what ticker symbol to see the company financials.

api_list.name: History Stock Split
api_list.description:
This gives you the Date, Open, High, Low, Close, Adj Close, Volume prices of the stock

QUERY PARAMETER: range = ['1y', '5y', '10y']
QUERY PARAMETER: interval = ['1d', 1wk', '1mo']
